s0: ^Mama：Hold on, the stuff will be ready soon.

first_talk: ^Mama：Hey, it's the painter! You'll have the usual?

b: ^Me：(The casserole here is a real treat, even better with some bean sprouts...wait, I think I forgot something.）
^Me：I'll have the Spare Ribs Casserole with rice!
^Me：I'll have the BBQ set! Lamb kebabs and grilled eggplant, please.

you_know_displace: ^Mama：You didn't hesitate to pay, I'll take it that you already know about displacement?

c-0: ^Me：I'll have the Spare Ribs Casserole with rice!
c-1: ^Me：I'll have the BBQ set! Lamb kebabs and grilled eggplant, please.

no_money: ^Me：...I'm out of cash...Could you please kindheartedly give me some plain noodles, I'm so sorry...I'll sell a painting tomorrow and pay it back.
^Me：To be honest, I'm not sure. I woke up and everything's gone.
^Me：(Crap, I sound like a shameless lier.）
^Mama：Right. You're a regular here, it's not like I don't trust you. It's okay to cook you something to eat.
^Mama：But you're carrying quite a few things with you.
explain_displace: ^Mama：What's wrong? You still can't figure out displacement? Why, you're not like a young person. Everyone displaces here.
^Mama：Just focus on the thought of turning this thing into money--see, how hard is that?

b: ^Mama：Your turn. Displace something, and I promise I'll make you a delicious meal.
^Me：(The rule of thumb of displacement: the more important something is to me, the more it's worth in cash.)
^Me：(Of course, the status of an object in one's mind changes, and so does its worth. Most people can't accurately predict how much something is worth. That's a risk you'll have to take.）
^Me：(Displacement has become a magic that everyone can do, whenever and wherever they want.）
^Me：(However, as a means of quick money, displacement has a <color=magenta>price</color> that I just hate to afford: <color=gray>disappearance</color>.）
^Me：(What's wrong with me! I don't even remember the whole displacement thing.）

explain_displace: ^Me：(I really can't pull myself together to beg for food, so I'd better see if there's anything worth displacing.)
buy_food: ^Mama：Sit down and wait! The food will be ready in three minutes.
finish_displace: ^Me：(That's it? Well, I have some money now.)
^Me：(Wait, what did I just trade away?)
^Me：(Such a pain in the ass. Stop trying to remember it--it just disappeared, leaving no trace of existence.）
^Me：(Anyways, it doesn't matter. Now I can buy something from Mama.)
